Package com.foreach.across.core.context

Class ClassPathScanningCandidateModuleProvider

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.core.context.AbstractClassPathScanningProvider
com.foreach.across.core.context.ClassPathScanningCandidateModuleProvider
public class ClassPathScanningCandidateModuleProvider extends AbstractClassPathScanningProvider
Based on ClassPathScanningCandidateComponentProvider, this class scans class path resources to detect valid AcrossModule implementations that could be autoconfigured. These must be concrete classes, with a public static NAME field and a parameter-less constructor.
Author:
Arne Vandamme
